on reading compounds: 枝【シ】counter for long, thin things (i.e. swords)
枝葉【シヨウ】branches and leaves, foliage, unimportant details, nonessentials, side issue, digression
茘枝【レイシ】litchi (Nephelium litchi), lychee, lichee, litchi nut, bitter melon (Momordica charantia), bitter gourd, Thais bronni (species of muricid gastropod)
kun reading compounds: 枝【えだ】branch, bow, bough, twig, limb
枝葉【しよう】branches and leaves, foliage, unimportant details, nonessentials, side issue, digression
若枝【わかえだ】young branch, sprig
下枝【したえだ】lower branches of a tree
